query: How does the new calculation of photoionization of interstellar matter build upon existing knowledge of the Complex of Local Interstellar Clouds?

citation_function_classification.justification: The query asks how a new calculation expands on (extends) prior knowledge of the Local Interstellar Clouds, while also referencing the foundational background of that existing knowledge.
